title: New: Burning God Little – Sorry For I Gar (ft. Bendik)
content:
This Oslo based outfit creates some intriguing ethereal electronic pop vibes with Sorry For I Gar.

Burning God Little gloriously stands next to names like Yumi Zouma or Air France, with their dreamy electronic pop aura surrounding Bendik‘s essential vocal harmony and a soft, disco groove cultivating an addictive rhythm that’s impossible to leave behind. Burning God Little are well and truly on your 2014 ‘Ones to Watch’ list.
